item.description:
At our Gloucester meetup we discovered what a wonderful place this would be for a summer picnic!  This is a beautiful park on the ocean... lots of areas to picnic and play.  A lovely small cove of beach is available for swimming too!  Bathrooms are conveniently located at the visitor's center.  You can walk out onto the rocks and sit right out at the ocean's edge.  Dogs are welcome too.

We won't be reserving a specific picnic table area but there is so much room.  There were table areas available today and it was quite busy.  Worst case scenario, we can set up anywhere in the open park!  We'll have to have some colorful balloons to help people find us when we arrive and figure out where to set up.  I will also update the meetup page and provide my cell #.

When you RSVP, please post what you will be bringing!!!!

It will be great to have a portable grill or two if possible. Any foods and beverages to share will be great.  They have a no alcohol policy, so do what you want to do, but I did my job by posting it.  Ha ha!

http://www.essexheritage.org/sites/stage_fort_park.shtml

Parking is $15 but well worth it, I think, for this beautiful location!  You can also carpool!
item.name: Oceanside picnic/cookout/beach day at beautiful Stage Fort Park in Gloucester!
